title: Chomper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Produce a sun every night.
-Eat a person every night, dealing a basic Attack.
-Eat a person every night, dealing a Powerful attack, then spit the body out and hit another person with It, dealing a basic Attack. Costs 3 sun.
-Devour a person, dealing a Powerful attack and wiping them of their last will and role. Costs 3 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -For an additional 2 sun, you may devour 2 people instead of 1.

desc:
Post 460
*42 SECONDS?! Thats nearly thrice the time it takes for Magnet Shroom to recover!*
